sites.url: javascript:(function(){document.body.setAttribute('contenteditable', 'true');alert('已开启网页编辑，按ESC键取消');document.onkeydown = function (e) {e = e || window.event;if(e.keyCode==27){document.body.setAttribute('contenteditable', 'false');}}})();
